name: Honoo no Doukyuuji: Dodge Danpei
overview: A dodgeball game that is based on a shounen serialized manga about a highschool dodgeball team. The game plays similarly to other "action" dodgeball games such as Technos' Super Dodgeball, though the game presents various modes based on story beats. For instance, the game starts with a one-on-one duel in which each combatant has five hits before they're out.
